titleInfo.title: Exterior of Kobey Shoe and Clothing Company

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#697 Kobey.'' On back of photograph: ''Kobey Shoe and Clothing Co, Aspen, 1910 #697.''

mods.abstract: Exterior of the Kobey Shoe and Clothing Company in Aspen, Colorado. Two unidentified people are standing in front of the entrance to the store and there are several advertisements in the windows.

name.namePart: Kobey Shoe and Clothing Company (Aspen, Colo.)
